headline: Deutsche Bank sees ‘risk-on’ setup for retail in 2026, favors AS and ROST
summary: Investing.com -- Deutsche Bank resumed coverage of retail stocks with a broadly constructive outlook for 2026, citing solid top-line momentum, improved consumer conditions and easing policy headwinds.

raw.headline: Deutsche Bank sees ‘risk-on’ setup for retail in 2026, favors AS and ROST

headline: Wall Street Analysts Look Bullish on TJX (TJX): Should You Buy?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in TJX (TJX). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
